column4: other channels: #medibuntu - nobody chats there, all are just idling, #ubuntu-devel (redirected from #ubuntu-dev): "this channel is for the development of Ubuntu, not really developing *with* Ubunt"... so where to next, then ?
there are.  Every* package has a source package.
Most of them are the same as the regular packages.  But if you view the package at packages.ubuntu.com (or launchpad) you can see for sure.
